resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Have not investigated yet, build: https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/383

cc [~xhochy]

comments.body: Is there a (preferred) way to skip these tests then? Seems we should get crossbow all green and not have to look at a list of builds and know which ones are allowed to be failing.
I agree that we should fix it. But I don't think we should block the release over it
